title: Installation issue: SLATE
body:
@G-Ragghianti 

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install slate~cuda+mpi~openmp%gcc@8.3.0 ^mpich
==> 14838: Installing slate
==> Cloning mercurial repository:
  https://bitbucket.org/icl/slate
*** failed to import extension hgext.qct: No module named 'hgext.qct'
destination directory: slate
applying clone bundle from https://api.media.atlassian.com/file/a9a28430-d35a-4a23-9d3f-263e90a6c015/binary?client=3ee4ae1e-f2c8-4973-9bbe-8eb8b6bed071&token=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJhY2Nlc3MiOnsidXJuOmZpbGVzdG9yZTpmaWxlOmE5YTI4NDMwLWQzNWEtNGEyMy05ZDNmLTI2M2U5MGE2YzAxNSI6WyJyZWFkIl19LCJleHAiOjE1OTAwOTA4MjgsImlzcyI6IjNlZTRhZTFlLWYyYzgtNDk3My05YmJlLThlYjhiNmJlZDA3MSIsIm5iZiI6MTU5MDA5MDQwOH0.cIpVIXK34dbGQeWRhoVdntZEPIoYKCkew4i0oB7Zszs
adding changesets
adding manifests
adding file changes
added 1928 changesets with 6434 changes to 673 files
finished applying clone bundle
searching for changes

adding manifests
adding file changes
files [==========================================================================================================================>          ] 335/361 01sadded 59 changesets with 103 changes to 33 files
new changesets 74b667a1ee89:d7981166da32
1928 local changesets published
updating to branch default
cloning subrepo blaspp from https://bitbucket.org/icl/blaspp
requesting all changes
adding changesets
adding manifests
adding file changes
added 423 changesets with 2571 changes to 361 files                                                                                                       
new changesets cce11f2ab27f:c84329e06c7d
cloning subrepo lapackpp from https://bitbucket.org/icl/lapackpp
applying clone bundle from https://api.media.atlassian.com/file/c7b8257f-d2ad-4924-9bd0-8fb9356064e3/binary?client=3ee4ae1e-f2c8-4973-9bbe-8eb8b6bed071&token=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJhY2Nlc3MiOnsidXJuOmZpbGVzdG9yZTpmaWxlOmM3YjgyNTdmLWQyYWQtNDkyNC05YmQwLThmYjkzNTYwNjRlMyI6WyJyZWFkIl19LCJleHAiOjE1OTAwOTA4MzMsImlzcyI6IjNlZTRhZTFlLWYyYzgtNDk3My05YmJlLThlYjhiNmJlZDA3MSIsIm5iZiI6MTU5MDA5MDQxM30.8hA01U3L8nxJ1YB-LUcj4j1fXHPLgt-d5BNi9k0JHY0
adding changesets
adding manifests
adding file changes
added 471 changesets with 6856 changes to 657 files (+1 heads)
finished applying clone bundle
searching for changes
adding changesets
adding manifests
adding file changes
added 1 changesets with 1 changes to 1 files
new changesets 93aaeec19588
471 local changesets published
cloning subrepo testsweeper from https://bitbucket.org/icl/testsweeper                                                                                    
requesting all changes
adding changesets
adding manifests
adding file changes
added 100 changesets with 232 changes to 58 files
new changesets c67e9294dd98:ba5a585bfc67
340 files updated, 0 files merged, 0 files removed, 0 files unresolved
==> No checksum needed when fetching with hg
==> Already staged spack-stage-slate-develop-eifwhggxwphtalruf7am57xnqwtnfkjp in /scratch/naromero/tmp/spack-stage/spack-stage-slate-develop-eifwhggxwphtalruf7am57xnqwtnfkjp
==> No patches needed for slate
==> 14838: slate: Building slate [Package]
==> 14838: slate: Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j12' 'mpi=1' 'mkl=1' 'cuda=0' 'openmp=0' 'CXX=mpicxx'

18 errors found in build log:
     28511                     #pragma omp task default(shared)
     28512    
     28513    ./include/slate/BaseBandMatrix.hh:373: warning: ignoring #pragma omp task [-Wunknown-pragmas]
     28514                     #pragma omp task default(shared)
     28515    
     28516    In file included from unit_test/test_LockGuard.cc:5:
  >> 28517    /nfs/gce/software/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/gcc-8.3.0-fjpc5ys/lib/gcc/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/8.3.0/include/omp.h:39:3
              : error: conflicting declaration 'typedef struct omp_lock_t omp_lock_t'
     28518     } omp_lock_t;
     28519       ^~~~~~~~~~
     28520    In file included from ./include/slate/internal/LockGuard.hh:9,
     28521                     from unit_test/test_LockGuard.cc:1:
     28522    ./include/slate/internal/openmp.hh:50:13: note: previous declaration as 'typedef int omp_lock_t'
     28523     typedef int omp_lock_t;
     28524                 ^~~~~~~~~~
     28525    In file included from unit_test/test_LockGuard.cc:5:
  >> 28526    /nfs/gce/software/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/gcc-8.3.0-fjpc5ys/lib/gcc/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/8.3.0/include/omp.h:45:3
              : error: conflicting declaration 'typedef struct omp_nest_lock_t omp_nest_lock_t'
     28527     } omp_nest_lock_t;
     28528       ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     28529    In file included from ./include/slate/internal/LockGuard.hh:9,
     28530                     from unit_test/test_LockGuard.cc:1:
     28531    ./include/slate/internal/openmp.hh:51:13: note: previous declaration as 'typedef int omp_nest_lock_t'
     28532     typedef int omp_nest_lock_t;
     28533                 ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     28534    In file included from unit_test/test_LockGuard.cc:5:
  >> 28535    /nfs/gce/software/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/gcc-8.3.0-fjpc5ys/lib/gcc/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/8.3.0/include/omp.h:82:1
              2: error: declaration of 'int omp_get_num_threads() throw ()' has a different exception specifier

```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
naromero@naromero-desktop ~]$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.14.2-1174-92989fbbf
* **Python:** 3.6.9
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu18.04-westmere
<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

### Additional information
I also get another set of GOMP related errors with `+openmp` variant

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
* [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4664437/spack-build-out.txt)
* [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4664445/spack-build-env.txt)

<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
